paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant p.Ala561Thr associated with Long QT Syndrome.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: When differentiated, the percentage of ventricular-like hiPSC-CMs... was similar between KCNH2WT/WT hiPSC-CMs... compared to the isogenic KCNH2 A561T/WT hiPSC-CMs.
The overall optical APD90 values were shorter in hiPSC-CMs transfected with ASAP2f modRNA, but there was still a significant prolongation in the KCNH2 A561T/WT hiPSC-CMs.

functional_data.summary: The KCNH2 p.Ala561Thr variant was associated with prolonged action potential duration in hiPSC-CMs.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was introduced into a control hiPSC line to study its effects.
key_quotes: optical recordings confirmed that both reporters could reveal prolonged AP duration (APD) in the KCNH2A561T/WT hiPSC-CMs.
there was still a significant prolongation in the KCNH2 A561T/WT hiPSC-CMs (136 ± 16.5 ms) compared to the isogenic KCNH2WT/WT hiPSC-CMs (84 ± 7.1 ms)

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear information on the KCNH2 variant.
